# Hello TEAM

checking 
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(signal)
left = read.csv("All_left.csv")
right = read.csv("All_right.csv")
blink = read.csv("All_blink.csv")

left_list = unname(unlist(left))
right_list = unname(unlist(right))
blink_list = unname(unlist(blink))

fil_N <- 128 
fs <- 10000 #sampling rate
fn <- fs/2
fc <- c(49,61) # remove frequencies from 49Hz to 61Hz
fc_norm <- fc/fn
fir_filter <- fir1(fil_N, fc_norm, type="stop")

filter

left_test = filtfilt(fir_filter,left_list)

ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(y = left_test, x = c(1:length(left_test))))
```
